scripts.install: python -m venv venv --system-site-packages && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --no-build-isolation fastapi uvicorn pydantic pydantic-settings httpx requests loguru python-dotenv google-generativeai python-multipart
scripts.install:tools: source venv/bin/activate && pip install --no-build-isolation astunparse radon lizard gitpython pygments chardet || echo 'Some analysis tools skipped due to compatibility issues'
scripts.setup: bun run install && bun run install:tools
